response.name: Post Transaction - Success
response.body:
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<response>
    <status>success</status>
    <transaction>
        <id>306543</id>
        <integration_id>22</integration_id>
        <our_transaction_id>TT34254MFV2H</our_transaction_id>
        <their_transaction_id>83100138</their_transaction_id>
        <account_number>016207721</account_number>
        <amount>100</amount>
        <attribute_1>016207721</attribute_1>
        <attribute_2>TT34254MFV2H</attribute_2>
        <attribute_3></attribute_3>
        <attribute_4></attribute_4>
        <attribute_5></attribute_5>
        <attribute_6></attribute_6>
        <request><?xml version="1.0"?>
<post-payment-request>
<our-transaction-id>TT34254MFV2H</our-transaction-id>
<account-number>016207721</account-number>
<amount>100.00</amount>
<currency>MWK</currency>
<credit-account>1040000152833</credit-account>
<credit-account-type>account</credit-account-type>
<debit-account>000000000001</debit-account>
<debit-account-type>account</debit-account-type>
<customer-account-number>000000000001</customer-account-number>
<customer-account-name>Fanuel Jeckey Mzizah</customer-account-name>
</post-payment-request>
</request>
        <response></response>
        <debit_account>000000000001</debit_account>
        <debit_account_type>account</debit_account_type>
        <credit_account>1040000152833</credit_account>
        <credit_account_type>account</credit_account_type>
        <failure_reason></failure_reason>
        <reversal_ofs_request></reversal_ofs_request>
        <reversal_ofs_response></reversal_ofs_response>
        <is_third_party_synced></is_third_party_synced>
        <is_t24_synced></is_t24_synced>
        <status>success</status>
        <failure_code></failure_code>
        <http_status_code>200</http_status_code>
        <source>172.25.5.112</source>
        <created_at>2024-09-11T15:47:43.000000Z</created_at>
        <updated_at>2024-09-11T15:47:43.000000Z</updated_at>
        <attribute_7></attribute_7>
        <attribute_8></attribute_8>
        <attribute_9></attribute_9>
        <attribute_10></attribute_10>
        <raw_request>{
 "CommandName" : "API_Payments",
 "Parameters" : [
     "2",
     "L3tm3in2$",
     "P",
     "016207721",
     "100.00",
     "2024-09-11",
     "TT34254MFV2H"
     ]
}</raw_request>
        <raw_response>[

    "ACCOUNT_NO": "016207721",
    "BANK_DOC_NO": "TT34254MFV2H",
    "EDAMS_RECEIPT_NO": "83100138"

]</raw_response>
    </transaction>
</response>
